    We'll help you design your dream home. Give us a call and you'll be that much closer to making your dream a reality!

Interior Designers & Architects

Niche Design Loft

Niche Design Loft is a turnkey interior design startup set up in 2017 by Karthik Radhakrishnan, an MS Graduate from the University of Southern California.

Observing the huge unorganised sector in the interior design industry which led to inefficient products and inconvenienced customers, Niche was set up to solve these issues.

Read More

What We

Are Known For

• Minimal work on site
• State of the art factory
• 100% customizable designs
• 5 year warranty
• round the clock customer support
• price based on carpet area

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”yes”][vc_column]

Testimonials

Divya Sridhar Kitchen Refurbishment

Niche makes the most of available spaces! They are budget conscious and are very transparent in their procedures. They transformed my kitchen to give it a very modern look! Love it!

Santhosh S. New home interiors

When I purchased my new flat, I dint want 'just another stock interior'. I had a specific idea and look in mind. Karthik and his team were very helpful and executed my vision perfectly. Thanks Niche!

P. Nawaz New home interiors

They are a really helpful bunch of people. The team advised me a lot along the way on how to make my interiors look stylish and be practical at the same time.

Ananya Kumar Civil renovation

We wanted to repaint our entire house. Niche did a clean and neat job. We did not have any issues. The entire process was totally hassle-free.

Happy Clients
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
